name: Meet the Monsta
description:
"Little Herbie G. Wells wants to play war! Now! Ahhh, nasty humans, I'm gonna shoot you with my giant lasers! Whaaa? You must be insane shooting back at me! Gimme your cows, mmm, milky beauties. Die humans, die!"

Controls:

  • Press A-S-D in turn (as if you were drumming your fingers on a table A-S-D A-S-D A-S-D) to move the tripod.

* click on the white window border to catch a focus if controls don't work

  • Aim and shoot with a mouse.
  • Pick up cows with the beam to replenish your life.

Thanks for playing!
